---
title: Beregovkski's Metadata
---

```{r, echo=F, warnings=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(DT)
df <- read.csv("data/beregovski-metadata.tsv", sep="\t", header=TRUE)
df <- df |>  select(!c(Mode, Secondary.modes, Modulation.measures, One_Mode, Mode.notes, Original.tonality, Original.tonality.directional, Modulation.Criteria, Additional.notes))
df |>          
    datatable(filter="top", rownames=FALSE)
```
